import React from 'react'; import {Formik} from 'formik' const FormOne = () => { return ( { const errors = {}; if(!values.firstname){ errors.firstname = 'sorry this is required' } return errors; }} onSubmit={() => { console.log('form submitted.') }} > {({ values, errors, touched, handleChange, handleBlur, handleSubmit })=>( <>

Personal information

)} ); } export default FormOne;
